law.catch_line: Administrative regulations to implement provisions of KRS 304.17A-621, 304.17A-623, 304.17A-625, 304.17A-627, 304.17A-629, and 304.17A-631.
law.text: The commissioner shall promulgate administrative regulations to implement the provisions of KRS 304.17A-621, 304.17A-623, 304.17A-625, 304.17A-627, 304.17A-629, and 304.17A-631.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1244, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 262, sec. 15, effective July 14, 2000.
